column3: Bujir knew you would be coming.
Investigate the Uyagir Caves and slay any enemies that appear.
Welcome, adventurer. Ibakha told me you would be coming.
She sees events long before they come to pass.
However, she did not only see you. No, she also foresaw a great threat.
The true nature of this threat is yet unclear, but we know it lurks in the Uyagir Caves. Please investigate it on our behalf.
The true nature of this threat is yet unclear, but we know it lurks in the Uyagir Caves. Please investigate it on our behalf.
Pray tell me, just what did you find?
A bird of prophecy? I must thank you for slaying it. That cave contains the minerals we use to create pigment.

Without those minerals, we could not paint images on the walls of our cave─images which show the danger of giving in to one's greed. We do this every full moon so that future generations may inherit our values.
My sincerest thanks for all your help. We owe you a great debt.
